name: Return the SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format for an NSC that is too long

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for SEPA Direct Debits in UBS format on the following Account:
| nsc | account |
| 9313222 | 01174066 |

children.description: Get UBS sepa direct debits transactions: aib.oneview.ui.model.account.SepaDirectDebitUBSListRequest@107812fd

testSteps.description: Then I should receive a Validation Error
